name: Seven days with the Ghost - Original Soundtrack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Seven days with the Ghost - Original Soundtrack - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Seven days with the Ghost - Original Soundtrack

short_description: The original soundtrack of Seven days with the Ghost is composed by wata of game developer LizArts. Both amusing and light, catchy and with hints of mystery that connect with the story, this soundtrack is a real pleasure to listen to!
